org.netbeans.swing.tabcontrol.plaf

Class WinVistaViewTabDisplayerUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • org.netbeans.swing.tabcontrol.TabDisplayerUI
        • org.netbeans.swing.tabcontrol.plaf.AbstractViewTabDisplayerUI
          • org.netbeans.swing.tabcontrol.plaf.WinVistaViewTabDisplayerUI

  • public final class WinVistaViewTabDisplayerUI
extends AbstractViewTabDisplayerUI
    Win Vista-like user interface of view type tabs.
